entity.name: 2020 Senate impeachment trial: Day 6
entity.description: The Senate continues its impeachment trial of President Donald Trump

entity.name: 2020 Senate impeachment trial: Day 7
entity.description: President Trump's legal team is expected to wrap up their opening arguments on Tuesday. The next phase of the trial, where senators will submit questions to both sides for up to 16 hours, is expected to begin Wednesday.
